'''The Crane Soars Skyward''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Passerine Herald" [[Xianyun]] ({{Anemo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|The Crane Soars Skyward}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Crane's Echoing Call]], a weapon tailored to Xianyun's gameplay mechanics.
